entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:02 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -14.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 03:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -14.8°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -17.2°C
Wind: SE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
